short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control your Smartwaiver Kiosk from your browser. Send participant information from your computer to your Kiosk for signature.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline the waiver signing process at your business with Smartwaiver. Convert your existing waiver into a digital smart waiver so participants can sign your legal documents ahead of time, online or at a Kiosk at your location. 

With the Smartwaiver Kiosk Control extension you can type in the participantâ€™s information from your computer and send it to a Smartwaiver Kiosk at your facility with the push of a button. The customer can then review the waiver at the Kiosk, with their information filled in, and then digitally sign.
